Control Name: 2.14.13 Mocks and stubs are used to test external dependencies in non-production environments.
Control Statement: Mocks/stubs can help to test and validate external dependencies, to increase test coverage, when accessing those external dependencies is not possible due to for example IP restrictions.

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 2.14 How are you testing and validating your workload?
